item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

This Saturday 04-17-10 we celebrate with a BLACK OUT GLOW PARTY in the Blue Room and KARAOKE in the lounge. We will provide all the GLOW wear so please come and celebrate with us.

We also have QUEER PROM by The DYKE March on the 2nd floor (The Terrace Ball Room. This is going to be a fun night.

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night: (10 min from Boston)

Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

Great DJ that will be mixing their R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

SUMMER TIME: We move the party outside to our spacious patio, that can accommodate over 500 women, were we dance underneath the stars till 1:30 am.

Any questions call 617 877 1808.

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Fire Place
• Premium Liquor
• (FREE FOOD)
• OUT DOOR POOL TABLES (coming soon)
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: This Saturday we celebrate with a BLACK OUT GLOW PARTY
